decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2880 - 01/MP, 2880 - 02/MP Rev. A, 2880 - 03/MP Rev. B, 2880 - 04/MP. Received: 06/11/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The proposed side dormer windows shall not be openable below 1.7 metres above the adjacent internal floor level and shall be kept permanently obscure glazed.

Condition : 5 - So far as is possible, the developer shall retain and reuse the existing roof tiles and, where this is not possible, or where additional materials are required to complete the development, these shall match the roof tiles of the existing building as at the date of decision.
Condition : 6 - The existing sprocketted eaves detail on the main roof shall be retained as part of the approved development.
description: Erection of a side roof extension incorporating a rear roof window to the house
